SELECT a.storeNo,a.storeId,a.storeName,a.userName,a.remain,a.phone,a.idCard,a.area,a.address,a.process,a.addTime,cds.deptName,s.`name`,s.supervisorId,top.totalPrice,tb.monthPrice,tb.monthNum,ca.totalVisitNum FROM t_store a LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor s ON a.supervisorId = s.supervisorNum LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(t.orderPrice)*0.01 AS totalPrice FROM t_order t WHERE `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) top ON a.userId = top.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(orderPrice)*0.01 AS monthPrice,COUNT(1) AS monthNum FROM t_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(orderTime) AND `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) tb ON a.userId = tb.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,COUNT(1) AS totalVisitNum FROM c_visit_record WHERE `status` = 0 AND visitResultStatus IS NOT NULL GROUP BY userId ) ca ON ca.userId = a.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT supervisorNum,deptName FROM sys_supervisor sss LEFT JOIN c_dept cd ON cd.deptId = sss.deptId ) cds ON a.supervisorId = cds.supervisorNum WHERE 1=1
AND a.supervisorId = #{relationMap.supervisor}
AND a.process = #{relationMap.process}
AND a.storeName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.storeName}),'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY totalPrice DESC

SELECT sup.`name`,ts.userId,ts.storeId,ts.storeName,ts.area,ts.supervisorId,ts.phone,ts.address,ts.userName,ts.addTime,ts.process,ts.`status`, ts.storeNo,ts.frontStorePic,ts.longtitude,ts.latitude,ts.storeArea,ts.chain,ts.equipment,ts.storeType,ts.partners,ts.building, IFNULL(ta.totalNum, 0) AS totalNum,IFNULL(ta.totalPrice,0) AS totalPrice,IFNULL(tb.monthPrice,0) AS monthPrice,IFNULL(tb.monthNum,0) AS monthNum,IFNULL(cc.couponNum,0) AS couponNum FROM t_store ts LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(orderPrice)*0.01 AS totalPrice,COUNT(1) AS totalNum FROM t_order WHERE `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) ta ON ts.userId = ta.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(orderPrice)*0.01 AS monthPrice,COUNT(1) AS monthNum FROM t_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(orderTime) AND `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) tb ON ts.userId = tb.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS couponNum , storeId FROM c_coupon GROUP BY storeId )AS cc ON cc.storeId=ts.storeId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor sup ON sup.supervisorNum=ts.supervisorId WHERE ts.`status` = 1 AND ts.storeId =#{0}
